<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"POST /sod/check — Check if granting a tool permission would violate SoD rules."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/nhi/sod/check"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Queries the agent's existing tool permissions and checks against all SoD rules
to detect conflicts. Returns the list of violations and whether the grant is allowed.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
